name: Gleeblings
description:
every 5 waves the zorbs evolve and get stronger, how long can your gleebs survive?

THIS IS A DEMO

for the Scorespace Gamejam #24

CONTROLS:

WASD to move your camera

Mousewheel zooms in and out

The hand in the center is used to pick things up

use your mouse for clicking

GOAL:

Kill zorbs to earn points and set a highscore

Keep your gleeb alive by:

feeding them

giving them water

killing zorbs by clicking on them

gleeblings have personalities!

game over occurs when all gleebs are dead and you don't have enough glims to hatch more

FAQ

Q: why did my gleebling randomly die?

A: probably starved or dehydrated to death...

Want to see more gleeblings or have some input/ideas? 

leave a comment and lets discuss the world of gleeblings!

the future of gleeblings:

one of the main things I want to add but didn't have time for is the ability to merge gleeblings together to get different traits, I also want the title to change what they do, for example a doctor gleebling may heal other gleeblings, a lord may give you more glims or an inquisitor may do magic idk
